test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X airconditioner)))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red) (sort Y washmachine))) )
test.nl: Do not go to the airconditioner. The door of the microwave is opened. The door of the washmachine is opened. A remotecontrol which is yellow in the washmachine. Put a book which is red in the microwave. Take out the yellow can from the closet. Put down the can. Close the washmachine. Put the blue book on the microwave. Put a bottle which is black on the washmachine. Put the red remotecontrol in the washmachine.
